top_comments.comment: Thank you so much for listing the recipe in grams. Will be baking these tomorrow. Just bought 25lbs of pecans from the farm today.

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Very nice🙏🏻Thank you for this video, I prefer walnuts over pecans 
… because of my Armenian /Persian background…also leaned walnuts have more protein and I love the taste 💪🏻so we’ll definitely going make some now, 
since it’s a big walnut season here in Glendale, CA ✌🏻
